tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Examinations,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: I visited today this clinic and met Dr. Joshna Mohan jyotsana mohan . She is the best doctor that I have experienced. While treatment I had no pain while she was injecting. Easily had the RCT and quick treatment. She is very polite and charged minimal amount in metro city like Delhi. I recommend this is a best place for the dental health and treatment.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. VIJAY Tanwar is for ortho and not dentist but when I searched you show his experience under dentist. Totally wrong information provided on your platform.
Dr. JOSHNA was there to attend patient with tooth problems but her experience is not 11 years. So please provide accurate information.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very nice experience...Dr Jyotsana attended me very politely and also answered all my queries very patiently. The  ambience of clinic is good especially the cleanliness. The wait time is also very very less and that's really a good thing. Dr. Jyotsana made sure the procedure was painless...thanks to her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Satisfactory experience and would highly recommend to visit Dr. Vijay's Dental Spa for any of your dental problems. I visited this clinic for my apical periodontitis of the RCT tooth. Dr. Jyotsana explained the issue with the treatment and patiently answered all my queries. I was worried on the way of treatment as am pregnant (2nd trimester) but the doctor and the staff were really helpful and took all the necessary precautions before proceeding with the treatment.
